title: How do you even win a game in this fucking game lmao?

replies.body:
Read your other threads firstly is a start. Most people don't improve cos they **don't put the effort into improving**. Secondly, focus on not dying so much. Some of your recent games:

 Tristana
2 / 10 / 2
0.40:1 KDA

 Poppy
3 / 15 / 11
0.93:1 KDA

 Poppy
3 / 14 / 6
0.64:1 KDA 

That's way too many deaths in the game!

Lastly you might like to play Ahri more often. She's your most played champion with best win rates and KDA. 


Ahri
161.0 CS avg
3.06:1 KDA avg
9.0 / 6.2 / 9.9 KDA numbers
62% winrate
74 Played

Become a god of Ahri while learning about the rest of the game (macro understanding) and then work your way into playing other champions to expand your pool.
just get your clown fiesta on and start enjoying clowning around https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-XkMc1x1EnUk/WBSLbljD06I/AAAAAAAAXD4/1_LA9NwQBk8Ub4biCpHAPKMCZ8w8b-4kwCEw/s1600/17.gif

You don't, Everyone plays this game because they hate themselves.
